statement.p: What is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent is the number in parentheses (1.0588). The increase is the amount more than 100. In this case that is \displaystyle{1.0588}-{1}={0.0588}. Converted to percent notation this is \displaystyle{100}{\left({0.0588}\right)}={5.88}\%.
